charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Sabrina
on the beach, silently facing her Alakazam with
her eyes shut.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1101_020:
She seemed to be in such deep concentration that
she did not even react to
[Name:PlayerNickname ] approaching.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_060: I’ve been wanting to talk to you.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_090: Let’s talk a bit. You’re already here anyway.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_100: Actually...I knew that you would be coming here.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_110: I foresaw that as a possible future.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_130: It’s one of my psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_150: It’s one of my psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_160:
I can see what’s going to happen before it
happens—only to a certain degree, of course.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_170:
I can also directly communicate with my Pokémon
without using my voice during battles.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_180:
I was just meditating with Alakazam so that
our communication can become faster and
more accurate.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0301_190: I didn’t know you could do that!
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_200: It seems like you’re impressed with this power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_220: It seems like you’re impressed with this power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_230:
Do you think that psychic power is something that
only a few people have?
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_240:
If that’s the case, you’re mistaken. Everyone has
psychic power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_260: Maybe you can’t tell the future or use telepathy...
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_270: but you can empathize with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_280:
If you gain experience with your partner Pokémon
and spend your days battling...
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_290:
you’ll naturally build trust in your relationship
and commune with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_300:
I think the power that trust and bonds generate is
worthy of being called psychic power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_320: Don’t worry. I know you have it.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0302_330: You think I have that, too?
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_340: Don’t worry. I know you have it.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_350: I had a vision of the future once.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_360:
I saw you and your partner Pokémon battling as
one. Your bond with each other seemed even
stronger than it is now.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_370:
I can’t tell whether the vision will be sometime
soon...or much farther in the future.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_380:
But Alakazam and I genuinely look forward to
the day it happens.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_400:
I have to make sure you don’t surpass us.
Alakazam and I will have to meditate together
a lot more from now on.
